price: He said, “I am better than him: You created me from fire and created him from clay.”
arabic: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهُ خَلَقۡتَنِي مِن نَّارٖ وَخَلَقۡتَهُۥ مِن طِينٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
